errors.try_again: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.wrong_credentials: The login credentials provided are incorrect
errors.email_exists: This email is already in use

main_page.business_look: Looking for a Business? Explore exciting collaborations and partnerships with businesses!
main_page.content_creator_look: Looking for a content creator? Discover the perfect content creators to elevate your brand!

sign_in_screen.by_clicking: By clicking "Sign In," you are agreeing to the terms of PeerPromote -
sign_in_screen.terms: User Agreement, Privacy Policy, and Cookie Policy.

sign_up_screen.we_are: In PeerPromote, we are your digital manager. If you are a content creator, we connect you with businesses interested in your content. If you are a business, we facilitate the search for content creators for collaborations. Complete your user profile to start connecting!
sign_up_screen.will_take: It will only take you 3 minutes!
sign_up_screen.register_as_creator: Sign up as a creator and discover businesses to collaborate with
sign_up_screen.register_as_business: Sign up as a business and discover content creators to collaborate with
sign_up_screen.complete_info: To help you connect with businesses, we need to complete your contact information
sign_up_screen.complete_info_company: To help you connect with content creators, we need to complete your contact information
sign_up_screen.all_ready: All set, verify your information to continue
sign_up_screen.complete: , you have completed your user profile. Now you can explore offers from businesses looking for promotion. Remember, in order to contact them, you need to complete your professional profile.
sign_up_screen.complete_company: , you have completed your user profile. Now you can post offers and find content creators looking to collaborate with you. Remember, in order to contact them, you need to complete your business profile.
sign_up_screen.discover: DISCOVER BRANDS THAT WANT TO WORK WITH YOU

drop_image_area.drop_here: Drag and drop an image here
drop_image_area.or_click: or click to select a file

field_errors.underage: We're sorry, but you must be at least 18 years old to register on our platform.
